author: empmachine
comment: finally, a flashcard app that not only imports csv, but let's me actually pick the delimiter! thanks!

author: Peter Fatouros
comment: Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to use and study on the go.
Sipmle. Love the option of making folders and possibility to put sets inside!!! Great :) Thx

author: Arturo Martinez
comment: it seems not possible to export flashcards to other devices

reply.author: Eric Abreu
reply.content: Thank you for your review. The latest update (1.3.0) added an option to export a set or folder as a CSV file, which can be imported in a different device. You can also export the entire flashcard database if that's easier. If possible, please try exporting your flashcards again after installing today's update

author: Amir Shariat
comment: Excellent flash card app that lets me use my flash cards on my watch. Super useful and works perfectly!
title: Perfect for Wear
